Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1971...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Diablo on 2/6/1973 (Going to DIA: 1B R. Tyler, P B. Triche, LF R. Silvas, P D. Plaza. Going to SHP: 1B B. Treadway)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1975, off Harry Taylor (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1975, off James Pressnell (PIT)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 5/13/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1979, hitting .400 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1979, hitting .371 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 8/2/1979...
Injured on 4/16/1980 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1980, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1981, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1981, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1981, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1982, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1983, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1983, hitting .361 with 9 HR, 28 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Penn on 6/19/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1983, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1983, hitting .343 with 8 HR, 35 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1983, hitting .321 with 38 HR, 125 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 5/17/1984...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1984, hitting .400 with 8 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1984, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1984, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1984, hitting .352 with 31 HR, 99 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1985, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/21/1986, off Paul Bleau (WT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1987, hitting .522 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Coney Island on 4/15/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1987, hitting .360 with 8 HR, 36 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1987, hitting .377 with 10 HR, 34 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1987, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against West Texas on 6/9/1990...
Injured on 5/17/1991 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
